self.onmessage = function(e) { const canvas = new OffscreenCanvas(200, 200); const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d'); ctx.fillStyle = 'blue'; ctx.fillRect(30, 30, 50, 50); // Anything below will be non-rasterizable. ctx.scale(1, 0); ctx.shadowOffsetX = 0; ctx.shadowOffsetY = 20; ctx.shadowColor = 'rgba(255, 165, 0, 0.6)'; // Open the layer with a non-invertible matrix. The whole layer will be // non-rasterizable. ctx.beginLayer(); // Because the transform is global, the matrix is still non-invertible. ctx.fillStyle = 'rgba(225, 0, 0, 1)'; ctx.fillRect(40, 70, 50, 50); // Set a valid matrix in the middle of the layer. tyle = 'green'; ctx.fillRect(70, 40, 50, 50); ctx.endLayer(); const bitmap = canvas.transferToImageBitmap(); self.postMessage(bitmap, bitmap); };

FAIL (fallback content)
